name: Strandead
description:
Strandead is a survival shooter game where you can craft weapons, tools and blocks. Made for JamCraft 2018.

As of now, you can craft:

  • Axe
  • Pickaxe
  • Pistol
  • Shotgun
  • Assault Rifle
  • Grenade Launcher
  • Wood Block
  • Metal Block
  • Health Potion

When you close the game, it auto-saves; so you can continue your adventure sometime later.

Credits:

Art: BumiBomber
Audio: Iodine
Programming: Matharoo
